Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the bottom of the sixth, staking the Mets to a 4-1 lead
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies fans expressed heartbreak and frustration after the loss
One fan evacuated from Florida due to Hurricane Milton and witnessed the loss
Fans wearing overalls with Phillies logos admitted they were 'fed up' by the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phillies fans were going through it as only Philadelphians can after the loss to the Mets
A fan named Courtney O'Neill said she might need to check into AA, therapy, or an institute because of the loss
